    • Method Detail

      • getFileReader

        public static scala.Option<org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.Reader> getFileReader(java.lang.String basePath,
                                                                  scala.Option<org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration> config)
        Retrieves a ORC file reader from a given path. The path can point to either a directory or a single ORC file. If it points to an directory, it picks any non-empty ORC file within that directory.

        The reader returned by this method is mainly used for two purposes:

        1. Retrieving file metadata (schema and compression codecs, etc.) 2. Read the actual file content (in this case, the given path should point to the target file)

        Parameters:
        basePath - (undocumented)
        config - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        (undocumented)
